name: Super Simple Guacamole Topping
author: Emmalise
summary: Avocados are a nutrient-dense super food that everyone should eat more often. Unfortunately, store-bought guacamole often has low-avocado content and high calories, and homemade guacamole requires several other fresh ingredients, lots of chopping, and often added salt. This light, simple guacamole is quick and easy to make. Top tacos or any spicy, Mexican-style dish with a tablespoon or two for a heart-healthy bonus! Store in refrigerator.
ingredients: 2  avocados - peeled, pitted, and coarsely chopped
directions: Mix avocados, salsa, and lemon juice together in a plastic storage container
